data.title: which T-code to cal automatic reorder point and update material master

qas.question: Hello Expert: Which T-code just to calculate automatic reorder point and update material master? I don't want to run MRP program (MD03,MD02,Md01) please help.

answers.text: if you have enabled forecasting view and do you have consumption values maintained or populated in basic additional views, than take forecast run with appropriate model and consumption data and it will change your MRP details accordingly in MM02 itself. You don't need to run any seperate t.code for it. Regards, Dakshesh

data.title: Confusion in choosing which Configuration scenario to use

qas.question: Hi all, My product contains 2 BOM levels. One component under the header material has 2 sub-components that needs to be procured from suppliers. All the other components are manufactured in-house. Any suggestions which scenario could be used in the configuration profile. Br, Thileepan P

answers.text: Thileepan Paulraj, Thileepan Paulraj, Thileepan Paulraj Are you using configurable sub assemblies which will be decided based upon characteristic value? Are you using configurable sub assemblies which will be decided based upon characteristic value? Ifs its normal FERT material and you are not using super BOM , just by maintaining 2 BOMs for subassemblies and a production version can help you. Ifs its normal FERT material and you are not using super BOM , just by maintaining 2 BOMs for subassemblies and a production version can help you. Production Versions - Material Master (LO-MD-MM) - SAP Library Production Versions - Material Master (LO-MD-MM) - SAP Library Production Versions - Material Master (LO-MD-MM) - SAP Library Please check and come back. Please check and come back. Thanks Thanks Ritesh Ritesh

data.title: in which info type  I can  find employee swipe in swipe out time recordings details for a day ?

qas.question: Hi Experts , Kindly help me in the below senario : I'm working for a client where the employee bio metrics are maintained in sql2012 server. my PI consultant will pick the data and place it on application server. here , my problem comes here. my job is to upload the employee swipe in , swipe out for a day in sap. an employee can have multiple swipes . I need to save the swipes in his data . can anyone tell me what is the infotype to maintain these swipes for a day . example data : emp.no date gate no in out 40015 28/06/18 A1 09:10:55 11:23:01 40015 28/06/18 B1 11:30:01 12:04:56 40015 28/06/18 B1 12:06:56 13:56:09 40015 28/06/18 D1 18:10:45 I appreciate if any one help me

answers.text: Look atTime Events Infotype 2011(table TEVEN and not PA2011) Time Events Infotype 2011 You could then useBAPI_CC1_UPLOAD_TIMEEVENTand BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT to upload those time events, and trigger their integration to HR withHR_CC1_TIMEEVENT_POST. BAPI_CC1_UPLOAD_TIMEEVENT HR_CC1_TIMEEVENT_POST

data.title: Fms Query which returns the minimum value calculation?

qas.question: Hi experts, I want one FMS query in which there are three columns x , y, z. I calculating through one query (x * y * z / a)=ValueA , (x * y * z / b)=ValueB and so on in that calculation query itself I want to identify the smaller value for example valueB is smaller then the fms want to get displayed as(x * y * z / b). (x * y * z / b) (x * y * z / b) I Request you people to help me in solving this Query Thanks and Regards, Sivaram

answers.text: Hi, Try this query for value A: SELECT convert(decimal(18,1),convert(decimal(8,1),((select $[$3.U_Declae.number]) * ((select $[$3.U_Cutting.number]) * (select $[$3.U_GSM.number]))))/10000) Value for B: SELECT convert(decimal(18,1),convert(decimal(8,1),((select $[$3.U_Declae.number]) * ((select $[$3.U_Cutting.number]) * (select $[$3.U_GSM.number]))))/10000) Note: Replace with your UDF in above queries. Hope helpful. Thanks & Regards, Nagarajan

data.title: Which time integration happen with PM & MM

qas.question: Hi, I want know Which time integration happen with PM & MM Regards, Ram Rathode

answers.text: Hi, 1 Non stock material(and servises)- from PM order generates PR, then PO. While GR costs booked to PM order. 2 stock material- from PM order generates reservation,material can be issued to the order against this reservation

data.title: Field which relates Delivery and Schedule line of the Sales Order

qas.question: Hi Can anybody post the table and field which relates the Delivery number with the Schedule line number. For example : Sales Order : 100001 Item : 10 - 5 pcs Schedule line 1: 0001 - 3 pcs Schedule line 2: 0002 - 2 pcs Two deliveries are created 1 . 200001 2. 200002 Now how do we find which delivery is created for which schedule line. Thanks in advance. Muthu

answers.text: Dear Muthu You can track the schedule line from Table VBBE - Field Name ETENR in which you cannot track the delivery reference. Delivery reference can be tracked either from LIKP or LIPS. However, if you want to see the document flow for a sale order, use table VBFA. thanks G. Lakshmipathi

Secondly is there a indicator in workorder which tells that yes a document is attached to this partcular task list ? Regards, Meghana

answers.text: Hi Not sure about header level but in operation one check box is available for PRT. If PRT is attached to operation check box is automatically selected.. On header screen at bottom you can see PRT check box if it is attached to first operation. Shail Edited by: Shailendra D Upadhyay on Jan 16, 2012 11:56 AM

answers.text: HRP1001 is a table view to see all the relationships between objects in OM. Instead you go to Tcode PP01, select the object, select relationship infotype and change what ever you want to. This is done thru front end view. Regards, Suhasini

Then i checkedhttp://help.sap.com/saphelp_45b/helpdata/en/c6/f83da44afa11d182b90000e829fbfe/content.htm, it says"Depending on the movement type, not all transfer orders must be confirmed." http://help.sap.com/saphelp_45b/helpdata/en/c6/f83da44afa11d182b90000e829fbfe/content.htm "Depending on the movement type, not all transfer orders must be confirmed." Depending on the movement type, not all transfer orders must be confirmed." Then i go to SPRO, define movement type.. i can not find my warehouse no+ 631(which is consignment fill-up schedule line's movement type).. So, can any one please tell me how to know if an transfer order have to be confirmed. and how to configure it? Thanks & Regards.

answers.text: I figured this out..problem solved. alone with movement type. storage type need to be configured as well. .

data.title: which requirement to be fullfilled first??

qas.question: Dear experts, in our industry ,we've implemented Strategy 40(planning with final assembly) for FG . Now if i'm having PIR in parallel to a sales order requirement ,while making a delivery by GR to warehouse,which requirement of the two will be catered first i.e. Requirement against against PIR or against sales order. How system will behave in this case?? Seeking for your valuable inputs .... Regds

answers.text: Unless I misunderstood you scenario, with planning strategy 40 PIR and sales orders are not in parallel. Sales orders reduce PIR according to the consumption indicator and periods. The Product GR has no effect on PIR or sales orders, the production order will disappear in MD04 and turn it into stock. Regards

data.title: Transaction CN41N at which release available

qas.question: Hi @ all, I hope somebody can help me in case of my question!? At the moment we have a ECC5.0 System and we would like to use the transaction CN41N, however, I gets an error message that this transaction isn't available. Thanks for your help. Kind regards Marco

answers.text: Hi Marco, There is a simple way find that wheather this TCode exists or not your current system Goto "SE16" in Table Name Field fill "TSTC" & press Enter then in Transaction Name field fill CN* and press F8 you see all the TCodes strating with CN But this CN41 is for Project Structure Overview in ECC5.0 may be in ECC6.0 it is upgraded as CN41N. Hope it is helpfull Regards Rehman Reward Relevant Points if Useful

This is very urgent for me. https://help.sap.com/viewer/a630d57fc5004c6383e7a81efee7a8bb/2011.500/en-US/8980ad05330b4585ab96a8e0... https://help.sap.com/viewer/a630d57fc5004c6383e7a81efee7a8bb/2011.500/en-US/8980ad05330b4585ab96a8e0...

data.title: SAP | Licenses | What is an "Active" user for which you need a license?

qas.question: Hi Experts, an consultant/auditor told me that you only need alicensefor"Active" Dialogusers. But what does "active" mean here? license "Active" Dialog We came up with this definition for active: 1 Notexpired expired 2 Notlocked locked 3 Not logged in for 30 days or more (we have a setting which auto locks these so they fall under cat 2) What is your opinion on this, is this a correct andcompletedefinition? complete For example, IT team members have two accounts, i.e. one limited end user one and a separate administrator account which is locked by default. ---> If the admin account wasn't locked, we would need two licenses for each one ---> In the current situation, we need one license for each one ---> What if my employee is locked the whole year except for an emergency case where he needs his admin/emergency account for only a few hours? Thx in advance!

answers.text: If your company has this strict policy, the only option might be: assign all licenses to allStandby accounts. Otherwise, whenever thisemergencyusers need to use system, it will not be available. Or always have some superusers available to reassign licenses to them. Standby accounts emergency Actually,Activehere is simply refer to the users need license. There is no question about it. Active

data.title: which iview can select an employee?

qas.question: Hi all,my mss version is BPERP5MSS13. when I preview some iview ,show me "To display data, first select an employee", I know the old version should add a teamview iview to a same page,but I can't find the teamview iview in currently version. who can help me.

answers.text: Hi, There is an iView called 'Employee Search'. This is the iView where the manager is shown a list of employees under him. He/she can then click on the iView to see details of the employee. This iView has some properties that reflect settings in Object and Data provider on the backend. Add this iView to your page and preview the page - not individual iViews. For example, there is a page called 'General Information' under line_manager -> Pages -> HCM. Preview this page, then you will be able to understand how MSS works. Regards, Priya

data.title: How the system understand which cost element is assigned for Subcontracting?

qas.question: How the system understand which cost element is assigned for Subcontracting? Regards Veenu

answers.text: Hi Veenu, 1) Create Sub Contracting charges as a cost element 2) Add it in cost component structure 3) In OBYC following needs to be done For Matl provided to vendor assign valuation classes for raw material and conversion charges withGBB - VBO GBB - VBO 4) Create overhead cost element 41 catg for sub contract overhead and define the costing sheet paramters accordingly. Here you can either credit to Purchasing cost center which absorbs the sub contract overheads. 5) In OKB9 - restric sub contract charges postings to Purchasing cost center - to have better control - If you wish to have it. Thanks & Regards Srinu

I am interested to extract data of orders activities like presented in KB23. Let me know, which table contains the data presented in KB23? Your help will be appreciated. Regards, Kooyot.

answers.text: COSS table contains the activites of the order. But in this table there is objnr object number no order but you can find your object number from aufk table. KOB1 report is also a goo alternative for you...

data.title: in which condition a client should have more than one "operating concern"?

qas.question: Hi All, Our holding operate in various business (like manufacturing: detergent, cosmetic, food productions, kitchen accessories, ..; sale and distribution; Training and University field,....). should we use multiple operating concerns? if we should do so, according to which market characteristics we should divide the client between operating concerns? would SAP characteristics help us to divide it? according which characteristics we should divide the operating concern between "controlling area"s?

answers.text: Hi, Kindly go through this site for details of operating concern. http://help.sap.com/saphelp_46c/helpdata/en/c6/f22c7dd435d1118b3f0060b03ca329/frameset.htm. http://help.sap.com/saphelp_46c/helpdata/en/c6/f22c7dd435d1118b3f0060b03ca329/frameset.htm Details of efine operating concern with characteristics,Value fields & Maintain operating concern are maintained here. The characteristic define to the operating concern are based on the requirement from the customer point of view. Some case it may be to Project,i some case it may be to Sales & distribution,Product etc.... Look in SAP Market place also for best practice to define this for the specific industry type. Regards, Raj

data.title: Time Type 0904 generates from which rule?

qas.question: Hi, Time type 0904 is used in Overtime Calculation. But i am not able to find from where Time Type 0904 is gets generate. Rule TP01 only initializing 0900. Please help with Time type 0904 generation process. Thanks, Viru

answers.text: Have you checked table V_T555Z - time type determination. Maybe someone had set this time type to generate automatically (unlikely). Or Table V_T559P - Limits for time balances? Otherwise it must be coming from a rule within your schema. In which case you should drill into the display log for the whole day and then do a search for the time type and see where its first created.

data.title: Reversing of a deal which has been used for a netting

qas.question: Hello expert, we would reverse a deal which has been used to net other flows. I got the error T4037: "Activity cannot be reversed as flow included in a netting transaction" How can I solve this issue? Thanks Regards

answers.text: Hi Larissa, You need to run TBR4 to undo the netting and then you can reverse the transaction. Regards, Feng

data.title: Which restrictions in procurement based on price validity / availbility of the info record

qas.question: Good morning from Germany! Is there any overview how the avialibility and price conditions in the vendor info record are working together or do restrictions on processes. My questions goes in those directions: Given that, availibility from is January 2018 to December 2018, price validity is the same - Can I create a PO TODAY (before 2018) in the ERP? - Can I create a PO in November 2018 with due date February 2019? We have an internal business unit claiming, that they are not able to place a due date outside the availibility even when for their business the PO CREATION DATE is in the avialibility. Is there any official help text about?

answers.text: Hi Nicolas, You can only have the current period you are in, and the next period - the creation of the PO will always default to the current 'valid from' date, so, anything created now would carry over to the next period (2018) - this will throw reporting, etc off somewhat. (Also bear in mind that POs, when created, are legal documents, so it would make sense to create 2018's in 2018) For 2019 however, it is not advised to do so in this way (your current period is 2017, next one is 2018, 2019 does not exist yet in the system) You cannot create multiple future periods - please review KBA 2499153. Hope this helps!

data.title: which value should I send for the field "business partner type " in DTW

qas.question: I need your help. I am trying to create a new business partner using DTW. I have been trying with the following values but the DTW fails with the error "invalid item name in enum BoCardCompanyTypes": tYES tNO cCompany cPerson I C cI cC Thank you for your help Jorge Manzo

answers.text: Please note: I use DTW Version88.1.7; API Version8.81.319 88.1.7 8.81.319 To set CmpPrivate (it is exactly BoCardCompanyTypes) use following: cCompany- Card represent a company. cCompany cPrivate- Card represent a private person. cPrivate To set CardType see Godon's replay. A lot of info you can find in "SAP Business One SDK - Help Center" docs. Thanks, Grzegorz

data.title: Vendor Returns for SLED materials which are blocked

qas.question: Hi All, We have certain materials for which Shelf Life has been expired. Using QA07, we have blocked these materials. Now we need to return those materials to vendor. We tried creating return PO. While doing MIGO (using 161 mov type ), it is showing the error "SLED 09.06.2011 of batch A has been exceeded". Please let us know how to return those material to vendor from blocked stock. Regards, Rosh

answers.text: Hi, In Transaction OMJ5, For Movement Type "161" and "122", keep SLED Check as Blank i.e. "No Check".

data.title: Which form's typeex property is 38?

qas.question: Which form's typeex property is 38? thanks in advance!

answers.text: "Settings - User Defined Fields" Accessible from Tools / User Defined Fields / Settings, when a UDF window is being displayed. John.

data.title: who printed or which printer was used

qas.question: Hello, please, does exist a possibility to create a query to see, who printed some documents or which printer was used for printing? Thank you for help, regards Jonmar7

answers.text: Hello Jonmar7, That kind of info will not be saved on any B1 tables. There is no way to create a query for it. Thanks, Gordon

data.title: Which stack does SAP Recipe Development rely on?

qas.question: Hi, Does SAP Recipe Development webdynpro applications use ABAP or Java stack? The SAP provided Webdynpro components for recipe development involved ABAP code, however I wanted to confirm which stack we should use to modify the existing recipe development applications? Can Java stack be used for SAP Recipe development? If we use Java, wouldnt it be on a separate system? My understanding is that we cannot have Java and ABAP stack on same system and since Recipe Development is dependent on EH&S, it probably will use ABAP stack since both EH&S and Recipe Development exist in the same system. Please suggest. Thanks & Regards, Naresh Makhijani.

answers.text: Hi Naresh, Recipe Development is part of SAP PLM 7.01/02, and as such, is entirely included in the NetWeaver ABAP stack. There is no need to use Java stack in this regard. Best,Rajeev

data.title: COPA: How I can easily identify my sender cost element is in which assignmt

qas.question: Hi Guru, In Settlement, how I can identify my sender cost element is in which allocation assignment in Tcode KSES? I am struggling to find it in the assignment one by one Thanks. Kick

answers.text: Hello Check this Structure Sender In assessment, each sender is defined by: Either cost centers or business processes (where the data to be allocated originates) Either a cost element or a cost element group (what is being allocated) Sender value (the value is being allocated) You enter the cost centers or business processes in the Allocation characteristics frame. The sender cost elements are grouped into a single assessment cost element or alternatively into several assessment cost elements via an allocation structure before being allocated to CO-PA. You enter the assessment cost element or the allocation structure in the segment header. You enter the sender cost elements to be grouped under allocation characteristics. The sender value can be calculated using various rules. You also enter the rule you want to use in the segment header. You must also enter a percentage for the sender value (with which the sender value is to be credited). The following are possible sender rules: Posted amounts (rule 1) Fixed portions (rule 2) Fixed prices (rule 3) If you use rule 2 or 3, you have to enter the fixed portions or prices for the individual senders in the sender values frame. Receiver The receiver is defined in assessment by: The profitability segment (which market segment is being allocated to / what generated the costs? The value field (which is being allocated to) Tracing factor (according to which distribution to the receivers occurs) The profitability segment for the receiver is defined by a combination of characteristic values. You enter the characteristic values in the Allocation characteristics frame. You can use a characteristic group to restrict the amount of characteristics offered at this point. Furthermore, to assign the respective characteristic group to the business transaction for indirect activity allocation to CO-PA, choose Actual Flows of Values ® Transfer Overhead ® Initial Steps ® Assign Characteristic Groups to Actual Cycles in Customizing. For the allocation of planning data, choose Planning ® Integrated Planning ® Transfer Cost Center Planning/Process Planning ® Initial Steps ® Assign Characteristic Groups to Plan Cycles. In the segment header, you specify the value field (or value fields for fixed and variable portions, depending on the sender selected in the cycle header) into which the sender cost elements are to be entered. Alternatively, you can enter a PA transfer structure with which several value fields can be found for each sender cost element. The tracing factor for allocating to the receivers can be selected using various rules: Variable portions (rule 1) Fixed amounts (rule 2) Fixed percentage rates (rule 3) Fixed portions (rule 4) If you use rule 1, you need to enter an allocation base for calculating the variable portions. The allocation base can be either a value field or a key figure and it is obtained by adding and subtracting value fields in CO-PA Customizing (by choosing Flows of Actual Values ® Transfer of Overhead ® Initial Steps ® Define Calculated Values for Use as Reference Values). Using rule 1 can sometimes result in a negative tracing factor. You therefore need to specify what scaling should be used in such instances. With receiver rule 1, you make the other entries for the tracing factor in the segment header frame. You can change and specify your entries in the tracing factors frame. The variable portion that is produced by the tracing factor can be manipulated again manually by choosing Receiver weighting. You can enter receiver-specific weighting factors, which are multiplied by the portion the system has calculated. Hence the portion calculated automatically and the receiver weighting factor you enter are both involved in the allocation. Reg *assign points if useful

data.title: How to remove Planning Area which is active in Product Planning

qas.question: Dear Team, 1) We want to remove Planning Area 131000 from all products - please suggest if possible... 2) We have other locations where no purchasing is required, only stock transfer should be done.... How to configure Material for same... For e.g... 121000 we can set procurement as external but 122000 we don't want procurement at all... all materials going to 122000 should only be by stock transfer. (can anyone explain how to setup system for this) Regards Vishal Kambare

answers.text: Dear Vishal, Once activated for planning am afraid it is not possible to remove it. For your other query against material XYZ for planning area 122000 you can set the procurement type as internal procurement or Source of Supply Priority Rule to bring products to this area by stock transfer order. Regards Leo

data.title: How to figure out to which PR planned orders are assigned in MRP

qas.question: Dear experts, inMD04I see planned orders unter purchase requisitions (PR). MD04 How they are linked? Is there a like anyhow? How ca I get related Planned orders for PR or PR for planned orders? Many thanks in advance. Best regards Patrick

answers.text: Hello Patrick There is no fixed link between the requirement and the replenishment element generated by MRP. You can try to use transaction MD09, where system dynamically tries to find this link. See my answer on threadhttps://archive.sap.com/discussions/thread/3414449for more details. https://archive.sap.com/discussions/thread/3414449 Regards, Caetano

data.title: how to display the public projects which I am not project partner/project accountant/project controller of this project?

qas.question: The Project has been in execute phase and "public project" has been turn on. I am not project manager or project partner or project accountant or project controller of this project. I belong the same service organization of the project. But I need to have visibility of this project. how to do that? Thanks

answers.text: ‎Hi ‎@Sally, You can search for the project with the project ID/Name in the "Plan Customer Project" app. However, your business user should have assigned with "SAP_BR_COM_PROJ_MNGR" role with read access. Thank You, Vijay
